document.full_text: japan's government plans to take control of tokyo electric power co , the operator of a stricken nuclear power plant, by injecting public funds, the mainichi newspaper said on friday.
document.title: japan to take control of tokyo electric power: report
lines_and_colors: japan's government plans to take control of tokyo electric power co , the operator of a stricken nuclear power plant, by injecting public funds, the mainichi newspaper said on friday.
